website_summaries.verdict: Cost-efficient product that does its job, but it may not hold up as well as the others.
pros: We love how it features both a plastic brush and a bristle roller brush
Suitable for all brushes and combs
cons: Some find the bristle brush flimsy and difficult to clean

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned my boar bristle brush very well. It didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned my boar bristle brush very well. It didn't get ALL of the hair out of it, but it was able to grab the majority of it, as well as the fuzz build-up. I did a final cleaning with all-natural shampoo and a quick soak of the bristles in hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Sam G

customer_reviews.title: BEST THING EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT! Best thing I have invested in! I don't have to worry about spreading unwanted germs or bacteria through my clients with this! Just cleaning and disinfecting was not enough. This gets deep into the comb's wells and gets the hairs! Would recommend any beautician/ cosmetology student to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Landaverde

customer_reviews.title: Comb cleaner does the job
customer_reviews.text: This comb and brush cleaner does the trick. Could not find anything like this in the stores, so it was nice to find it on Amazon. I didn't clean combs very well before having this and forget about cleaning brushes!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money! Scalpmaster brush/comb cleaner
customer_reviews.text: The rotating brush pops out of it's holders with each rotation & the bristles are too soft. Had planned to return it but the cat carried off the brush section to add to his "mouse" collection.
customer_reviews.author: karas2495

customer_reviews.title: Works very well. Except now I need a cleaner ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Except now I need a cleaner to clean the cleaner as I find it almost impossible to remove the hair stuck in the middle compartment.
customer_reviews.author: njoud

customer_reviews.title: Best gizmo I’ve found on here!
customer_reviews.text: Was going to buy a new brush. Could NOT get the hair out. I’m sure glad I bought this instead. It doesn’t work just pulling. So I cut through all the layers in between the bristles, stuck the magic gizmo in there and pulled. The hair came off like a little mat, all in one piece. Took about two minutes. My brush is like new again! 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Connie Jojo

customer_reviews.title: It's easier than soaking the combs
customer_reviews.text: It's easier than soaking the combs and then cleaning them with a toothbrush. But because the roller brush turns, it doesn't grab and hold the grime as well as a fixed brush. So, I manually hold the brush so it doesn't roll. It is easier than soaking. So, it gets four stars.
customer_reviews.author: C B

customer_reviews.title: Useless!
customer_reviews.text: Useless middle 'brush' area...it does nothing. The top prongs are easily broken. Wanted a cleaner for my boar brushes.....this isn't it!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M.Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Truly great tool to clean hairbrushes!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! I’ve been looking for something just like this to clean my hairbrush, and it sure cleans my brush perfectly. No more wasting time picking on lint and hair from the bristles! Truly useful!
customer_reviews.author: Miriam C. Belanger

customer_reviews.title: Works great at cleaning out hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: Although I thought this was a little pricey, it works great at cleaning all the hairs out of my hair brush. I was also able to get all the fuzz out of my blow dryer vents that had accumulated there. Very nifty tool.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: Got the hair out of my brush...and took several bristles with it. Should have just bought a new brush.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Item is just as described and it does work. The only thing that bothers me is that it is made of plastic and might break. I was trying to find one made out of nylon like my wife has had for over 40 years but couldn't locate one. Hers is a Fuller.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ziliak

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Handy tool which works very well on bristle brush and comb. Plastic tipped brush is a little trickier, but still better than any other method I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: BamaMama

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Brush Tool
customer_reviews.text: Great little tool to clean hair brushes. I would recommend this product and seller to others.
customer_reviews.author: missPhoebes

customer_reviews.title: Maybe better for a brush than a comb cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of awkward to use on my comb. Maybe better for a brush cleaner? Another thing to set in the cabinet. An old tooth brush is working better for me
customer_reviews.author: C. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: This brush makes cleaning my hairbrush much quicker. I use the teeth part 1st to lift the hair, and then the little fuzzies I always get stuck to the tips of the bristles come of easily with the brush part. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: NC Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Finally able to clean combs and brushes
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and cleans combs and brushes very well - would buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BWeb

customer_reviews.title: Best Comb/Brush cleaner out there
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. If only there was another little cleaner brush to clean this cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Snigda

customer_reviews.title: Worked the first time. Further use will tell
customer_reviews.text: Small piece and it will probably break, but it did do the job the first time. Better material and construction and it might get a bronze medal.
customer_reviews.author: Stoney

customer_reviews.title: CLEANLINESS IS NEXT TO GODLINESS
customer_reviews.text: IF YOU'VE GOT HAIR AND YOU BRUSH IT YOU SHOULD HAVE AT LEAST ONE OF THESE!
customer_reviews.author: MISS. MORRA

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cleaning brushes and combs but....
customer_reviews.text: Cleans brushes and combs well but not easy to self-clean or remove hair from it.
customer_reviews.author: MimiCupcake

customer_reviews.title: Clean hair loves clean brush & combs!
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a good tool to clean combs & brushes & this one is great!
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie A.

customer_reviews.title: Great brush cleaner and great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this little brush cleaner it’s a awesome tool for cleaning my brushes
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Makes cleaning hair brushes so much easier. Quickly removes all hair from brushes so you can then clean.
customer_reviews.author: MLHardee

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy!
customer_reviews.text: It is durable,easy and works well! I HATE cleaning My brush, but with this it is so easy and worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Tucker Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Hair tools
customer_reviews.text: Love it, ready to use. My mom noticed me using it and wanted it. I'll be purchasing another real soon!
customer_reviews.author: Fawn Tadios

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was larger
customer_reviews.text: This cleaning tool works pretty well but I wish it was bigger for larger Combs and not just the small ones that I have.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Clean
customer_reviews.text: Both sides works ssmazing to clean my brish...a must have
customer_reviews.author: farah

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily and this keeps my hair brush nice and clean.
customer_reviews.author: GrandMama2

customer_reviews.title: Brush/comb cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I use this to clean my combs and brushes. I love it. Im a hair stylist and use products tht sometimes get in my combs like gels for example. This tool gets the products from out of the cracks and in between the teeth of the comb.
customer_reviews.author: Shannetta M.

customer_reviews.title: Good comb cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Very good comb cleaner. Easy to use with the roller brush. Have not used it on a brush.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Wayne S. Mergott Jr.

customer_reviews.title: A Handy Little Tool!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Efficiently gets hair out of my round brushes and flat brushes. The rolling bristle feature works really well!
customer_reviews.author: MsPoe

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Arrived on time. Can’t beat the speed of Prime shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: fast and efficient
customer_reviews.text: works really well and faster than a regular comb or brush
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jones

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Addition To Hair Brush Accessories
customer_reviews.text: This is a new hair remover tool for me and I like it. I even use the roller brush to remove the lint from my hair brushes. It's a nice addition to my hair brush accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Granzow

customer_reviews.title: It is what it was advertised to be and that's important to me.
customer_reviews.text: I used it for its intended purpose. Cleaning combs and brushes. As for durablility, I haven't had it long enough to judge that.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry L. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of using a fingernail brush to clean our hairbrushes--this removes the tangled hair and scrubs them easily.
customer_reviews.author: Suzysnowflake

customer_reviews.title: Bad idea
customer_reviews.text: Bad idea. It doesn't work and is a waste of time money and energy. Looking for that little tool we used to have from Fuller Brush Man
customer_reviews.author: Lynnz

customer_reviews.title: Can't find a tool like this in any stores!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. A handy gadget to keep your brushes clear of hair buildup.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!!
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart when I opened package. Can't get brush part to stay on. Going back
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Great brush cleaner. Easy to use and no more destroying of combs.
customer_reviews.author: LAINKANSASCITY

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: It worked well scraping off hair from my comb. The price is ideal too.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Love this- I had something like this for years and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this- I had something like this for years and it broke- I was glad to find this one and ordered more - so easy to use and works great
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I like the tool it really changed the game when cleaning my brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Spend another dollar, don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy, and wheel forced me to use another comb to clean that.. horrible
customer_reviews.author: Marriam H.

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned brush well.
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned my brush well. Did what it was intended to do.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: All in on cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I like having comb and brush cleaner on same tool rather than separate cleaners for both. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought one for me, and then bought another for my mom, very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Farah

customer_reviews.title: Workes great with brush
customer_reviews.text: cleaner for my triple-bladed comb. Workes great with brush, too
customer_reviews.author: Caroljane

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like I thought it would be and then it broke.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl clark

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does the job - cleans both combs and brushes well.
customer_reviews.author: Penguineman

customer_reviews.title: Frustration-Free Comb and Brush Cleaning Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is one great comb and brush cleaner. The teeth very effectively remove built-up hair from around a barrel-shaped brush with little repetition necessary. The brush easily and thoroughly removes the worst gummy, built-up hairspray mess from combs. I wish I'd had one of these decades ago.
customer_reviews.author: robynseggblue

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: i had trouble cleaning my bristle hair brush, but when i tried this, it worked like a charm. definitely recommend it. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Enid Wasfi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: For stylist it's great for cleaning my brushes and combs I wish I had this years ago
customer_reviews.author: Misty T Gotcher

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!- Updated- a total waste.
customer_reviews.text: I am not very sattisfied with this but it is much easier cleaning the brush with this than without it! Update- This thing turned out to be a total waste after a couple of weeks. The inside roller thing keeps coming off and you may hurt yourself trying to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Vivek

customer_reviews.title: The part in the middle fell out right away
customer_reviews.text: I'm also not even sure what that part is for, as even when I put it back in place it didn't seem to do anything (and proceeded to fall out again and again).
customer_reviews.author: Bluegill

customer_reviews.title: DOES THE TRICK
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking all over for a comb-cleaning brush like my mom had way back when. This one does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money! Doesn't work as advertised. Very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy a fishtail comb.
customer_reviews.text: This is not very helpful for cleaning hairbrushes. A fishtail comb works better. I haven't figured out what a the black brush is for.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Perez

customer_reviews.title: Brush cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Best brush cleaner ever. When I towel dry my hair the lint from the towel gets into my hair then I comb my hair and the lint goes into the brush so this device cleans the lint from the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Frank H. Clemens

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do the job.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't do the job, at least on combs. Marginally better, but not close to clean.
customer_reviews.author: lnmsdad

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for me
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to buy this based on other reviews. Well, I have no complaints. It works perfectly to clean my comb. It's a nice quality, not cheap flimsy plastic. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: April L.

customer_reviews.title: Brush/ Comb Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This brush/ comb cleaner really does the JOB. Two or three swipes and brush/ comb looks as good as new. So happy to have found this little item, that does such a BIG job!
customer_reviews.author: Doris Titanic

customer_reviews.title: I finally found a comb cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I love the comb cleaning part of this tool, and I love that the brush cleaner "claws" really pull all the hair out of the brush, but the claws for doing so, break very easily. But then again, it was very inexpensive and if I'd known it worked so well I would have ordered a few extras. I just didn't expect the pieces to break so easily or quickly!
customer_reviews.author: paso judi

customer_reviews.title: This  little gadget really  keeps hair brushes clean
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget does a great job cleaning the hair out of combs and brushes. I have some styling tools that collects a lot of hair and it’s almost impossible to clean them. This little device gets out all the hair that gets down inside the bristles. Very inexpensive But this little gadget really does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Flossygirl

customer_reviews.title: not made heavy enough
customer_reviews.text: it didnt work that well for me, years ago we hade a comb cleaner and it was great, this one really needs to be made heavier, the brush doesnt roll when a comb is inserted, i returned it.
customer_reviews.author: audiophile tom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and a great price. It works very well on plastic, metal and wood brushes. I can't rate the durability because I've only used for 3 brushes. It makes getting hair out very easy and fast.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: It's usefulness is debatable
customer_reviews.text: Ummm, well, this is actually a bit flimsy and not extremely useful. I can clean my brushes much more easily with other methods. So even though it is very inexpensive, it's usefulness is debatable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mcginnis

customer_reviews.title: I like this brush cleaner
customer_reviews.text: For the price I did not expect something this sturdy. It does a great job of combing through my brushes and cleans down to the base.
customer_reviews.author: check2

customer_reviews.title: The other part cleans my brush pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because the roller broke immediately. The other part cleans my brush pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: ifli

customer_reviews.title: Super effective, super price!
customer_reviews.text: This cute, weird looking little tool is amazingly efficient! It cleaned all my different brushes AND my heated tools with brushes in no time flat, easily and quickly... and cleaning IT is a snap! Its low price makes it a great deal as well.
customer_reviews.author: SteelersGal4Ever

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and durable.
customer_reviews.text: It takes time to use this product when you're cleaning brushes and combs. While using hot water to clean out the gunk off in tight areas, this product is helpful, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: C.M.

customer_reviews.title: One of Those Must-Have Little Tools
customer_reviews.text: This gift was for an elderly friend of mine, whose brushes and combs sparkle because of this little device!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Highly Disappointing product
customer_reviews.text: The product does not do the job, my hairbrush is still dirty. Very disappointed as can not even return it.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brush cleaner! It works so much better than those wire ones, which end up all bent messy looking.
customer_reviews.author: zon buyer

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: Works great for cleaning the hair out of my brushes. Much better than anything I have tried before.
customer_reviews.author: P. L. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: This makes cleaning brushes so easy. I can clean a collection of 6+ brushes/combs ...
customer_reviews.text: This makes cleaning brushes so easy. I can clean a collection of 6+ brushes/combs in less than 20 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great. I am getting one for my vac cleaner ...
customer_reviews.text: Handy. I used to use a comb to run through brush. Great. I am getting one for my vac cleaner roller And another one or my grandaughter to pack for camp.
customer_reviews.author: l m miller

customer_reviews.title: It does work. Removes more hair then the fingers ...
customer_reviews.text: It does work. Removes more hair than fingers alone. Only improvement that might get more hair out is increasing the area of the tool, but other then that it is a solid four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Delfun

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning hairbrushes
customer_reviews.text: I use this brush and a bowl of warm soapy water to clean our hairbrushes once a month to remove hair and residue. Works as intended. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Terra

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: When using tines, hair gets into brush and must be combed out by another comb. Kind of defeats the purpose, almost. It is more useful than not, and I truly think that if it was removing longer hair, mine is short, it would be greatly helpful. The little brush certainly helps clean combs. I soak my combs in shampoo water and then use the little brush to finish cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: youngoldlady

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work s great. Been needing something like this for as long time but couldn't find
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The brush is small, but efficient. I have long thick hair and it was able to pull all the hairs in my brush. It's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The comb / brush cleaner is to weak of a plastic. I need a more heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: peekaboo

customer_reviews.title: Works Like a Charm
customer_reviews.text: This may look a little unusual but it works great. I wash and blow dry my hair every day and use a variety of round brushes which are very difficult to clean. This pulls all of the hair out and now my expensive hair brushes are like new again. I just wish I would have known about this product before I threw some of them away.
customer_reviews.author: Nan G.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: The little brush wheel comes off easy if you put too much pressure but overall works great
customer_reviews.author: Lady sandy

customer_reviews.title: Love this cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This works great on the Wet Brush and the Shine brush. The comb gets the hair out and then I run the roller over the brush to clean off any fuzzies.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Works as Designed!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tool for cleaning combs and brushes! Wish I had found this 20 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy J

customer_reviews.title: Brush cleaner didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I like the comb cleaner, but in my opinion, the brush cleaner is worthless. I would not recommend or purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Special K

customer_reviews.title: multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: works on my on multiple brushes. including plastic, boar hair, man made bristles. also cleans my hair blow dryer fan vent.
customer_reviews.author: marietipton

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to use... doesn't clean the brush well. WASTE of MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Lou

customer_reviews.title: Purchase yourself one
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cleaner for combs and brushes. It get all the hair out the brush unlike using a regular comb.
customer_reviews.author: L. Steele-Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice little tool not sure what the roller brush is for though
customer_reviews.author: Miss S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool to accomplish a mundane task
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to clean the combs my mother uses in Assisted Living. Her hair spray and rinses leave a dark and difficult to remove residue on her combs. This product helps to remove the build up nicely. I still have to bleach her combs to lighten the staining though.
customer_reviews.author: skylight

customer_reviews.title: Works well and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for an item like this for a long time, then I remembered that Amazon has all kinds of good things to sell some of it through sellers. The order arrived in time and in good condition and it does it's job perfectly. In addition it is so inexpensive that there's nothing to consider.
customer_reviews.author: nlenz

customer_reviews.title: Hairdresser recommended
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser recommended this when I asked how she cleans her brushes. I use it almost everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G.

customer_reviews.title: Scalpmaster Brush/Combine Cleaner Tool
customer_reviews.text: This really helps when I want to clean my brushes - good for combs too!
customer_reviews.author: GoodNeighbor

customer_reviews.title: Even with low pressure the cleaner scraped off the plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: Even with low pressure the cleaner scraped off the plastic instead of the dirt. Both the plastic brush as well as the teeth did not serve the prupose.
customer_reviews.author: napoleaninlondon

customer_reviews.title: needed it
customer_reviews.text: keeps brushes clean and has several ways to remove hair. love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great performance as a cleaner brush. In fact I have bought 3 more!!
customer_reviews.author: P. DeOntanon

product_meta.title: Scalpmaster Brush/Comb Cleaner
product_meta.description: Easily removes hair and residue form combs and brushes. Its scalpmaster. Brush comb combo. Made in USA.
feature_bullets: Easily removes hair and residue form combs and brushes
